user.title: CasaDNS configuration
user.description: Configure the CasaDNS integration. Enter your CasaDNS domains and API token.

error.invalid_domains: Please enter at least one valid domain (comma-separated, without .casadns.eu).
error.invalid_token: Please enter a valid API token.

update_now.name: Force CasaDNS update
update_now.description: Force a CasaDNS DNS update, ignoring the cached public IP.
